page.title: 04Leisure Time
page.content: {Tina's play I spend a lot of my time reading and I also like painting and drawing.My favourite sport is Netball although I like playing football with the boys. {Jamie's play { }My favourite pastime is playing football,although I do enjoy playing most sports.I like cricket,tennis and snooker a lot.I also have a Spectrum computer and have loads of games to play on it. {Elaine's hobbies { }I am a very keen dancer and go to a dancing club where I learn many dances of different styles.I like to dance to modern music and have made up dances with my friends at school.
